about_the_game:
Draikai is a captivating 2D platform game that draws inspiration from beloved titles like Cave Story. Step into the shoes of Bianca, a courageous young girl who resides by the beach and embarks on a mission to aid her ailing green dragon. This majestic creature has fallen victim to the nefarious machinations of an evil scientist, who seeks to unleash diseases upon the kingdoms.

Prepare yourself for an enchanting adventure as you navigate through meticulously designed levels, showcasing the game's super-sharp and delightful platform gameplay. Overcome countless challenges while immersing yourself in the world of Draikai. But it's not just about surmounting obstacles—along the way, you'll uncover hidden secrets and gradually unravel the mystery surrounding the malevolent scientist.

Explore a meticulously crafted world brimming with intricate details, fascinating characters, and peculiar creatures (some of which are truly extraordinary). The game's pixel art graphics, paired with a truly captivating soundtrack, create an immersive atmosphere that will stay with you long after the journey ends. Draikai is an unforgettable experience tailor-made for fans of platform and adventure games.

Join Bianca and her dragon on their heartfelt quest to conquer internal and external challenges, as they strive to bring a cure to their afflicted companion. Will you rise to the occasion and assist them in their noble mission? The fate of Draikai rests in your hands.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Intel i3+
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM

short_description: Help Bianca in Draikai, save her dragon. Face an evil scientist, discover secrets, defeat bosses, explore a pixel art world, and an amazing soundtrack. Overcome internal and external challenges in this unforgettable adventure.
